page.title: 20THOUGHTS ON DOMESDAY PROJECT
page.content: The history we have learnt about at school has always been much more interesting when it has been about particular people.We wonder if some of the things we do will seem strange to people in the future.We like 1985! Changes happen very quickly,ask our grandparents,but it's difficult to imagine what there is left to discover.We hope that there will be peace in the world,nobody will be starving and that the doctors will find ways to stop lots of the diseases. We enjoyed working on The Domesday Project.It was good to do work that was going to be useful.We think that computer discs are a good way of storing information but hope that they won't replace books completely. Good luck to the whole project from Lyngford Park County Primary School.
